name: Digital Professional Coating Thickness Gauge Industrial-818 Paint Meter for Fe/NFe with Measuring Range: 0-197 mils | Resolution 0,001 mils | PC Connection
short_description: HIGH-PRECISION INDUSTRIAL TOOL – Professional coating thickness gauge designed for industrial applications. Offers ultra-fine resolution of 0.001 mil for highly accurate, non-destructive measurements on a wide range of surfaces.

DUAL MEASUREMENT PRINCIPLE – Uses magnetic induction for ferrous (Fe) substrates and eddy current effect for non-ferrous (NFe) substrates. Automatically identifies the base material for fast and precise operation.

WIDE MEASUREMENT RANGE – Measures coatings on ferrous metals from 0–197 mils (0–5000 µm) and non-ferrous metals from 0–120 mils (0–3000 µm). Suitable for paint, powder coating, plating, anodizing, and more.
ADVANCED SENSOR WITH RUBY TIP – Equipped with a high-precision measuring probe featuring a wear-resistant ruby tip for long-lasting accuracy and reliable contact on flat or curved surfaces.
MULTIPLE UNIT OPTIONS – Easily switch between mils, microns (µm), and millimeters (mm) to match your workflow. Ensures accuracy with a typical deviation of less than ±3% +1 digit.
PC CONNECTIVITY – Built-in data transfer capability for easy export of measurement records to a computer. Ideal for quality control, reporting, and industrial inspection documentation.
DURABLE DESIGN – Shock-resistant housing with rubberized protective cover provides durability in harsh industrial environments. Compact and ergonomic for field or workshop use.
VERSATILE PROFESSIONAL APPLICATIONS – Ideal for automotive paint inspection, marine coatings, fireproof coating thickness, manufacturing QA, and maintenance of metal structures and pipelines.
